p: Wesselsbron virus (WSLV) shares ecological niches and similar livestock symptoms with Rift Valley Fever virus and misdiagnosis is common [ 34, 87]. WSLV RNA was detected using molecular diagnostic tools in Kenya from An. coustani and in humans in Senegal [ 34, 87]. Aedes mosquitoes are the presumed main vector of WSLV but the involvement of Anopheles mosquitoes remains to be elucidated.
